attributes.action: Give key workers a tax break (not on sickpay) throughout the COVID-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: I simply think they deserve it to stop them taking easy option staying at home.
attributes.background: Give our countries key workers an income tax break whilst they are working throughout the Corona virus outbreak, to include nhs staff, care workers (elderly, children) supermarket workers,  truck drivers etc these workers are getting on with making sure we are as well as we can be.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
